sub_fields.label: List Custom Content or Recent Posts
sub_fields.name: list_type

sub_fields.label: Recent
sub_fields.name: recent
sub_fields.instructions: If not the most recent posts, put in a custom post type, eg: "testimonial", "event", and "team-member".

sub_fields.label: Manual Content Picker
sub_fields.name: manual_content
sub_fields.instructions: Manually select content. Note: this module expects a featured image.  Make sure selected content has one, or risk display issues.

sub_fields.label: Post Type
sub_fields.name: post-type
sub_fields.instructions: If not the most recent posts, put in a custom post type, eg: "testimonial", "event", and "team-member".

sub_fields.label: Button?
sub_fields.name: showbutton
sub_fields.instructions: Do not check this box if you want to link the content but not show a button.

choices.full: Full (best for awards and different sized images.)

sub_fields.label: List Custom Content or Recent Posts
sub_fields.name: list_type

sub_fields.label: Recent
sub_fields.name: recent
sub_fields.instructions: If not the most recent posts, put in a custom post type, eg: "testimonial", "event", and "team-member".

choices.full: Full (best for awards and different sized images.)

sub_fields.label: Flexible Content
sub_fields.name: row_content
sub_fields.instructions: When you add more blocks, they will show up next to each other in a single row.

sub_fields.name: width
sub_fields.instructions: Use this only if you have checked the preview and the item's width looks incorrect. Note for developers: did you check mobile?

sub_fields.name: width
sub_fields.instructions: Use this only if you have checked the preview and the item's width looks incorrect. Note for developers: did you check mobile?

sub_fields.label: Map
sub_fields.name: map
sub_fields.instructions: Did you enter the Google API key in Braftonium Options under Appearance? If you need an API key go to this page and get yourself a key. Click the "Get Started" button, click Maps, Routes, Places, and press Continue. Select a new project and follow the instructions to set up your billing information. Copy and paste the API key there.
